Detailed Description

Represents a 32 bit integer in big endian format.

struct { ... } BigEndian32Bit::m_uint8
 

UINT8 BigEndian32Bit::m_uint8_ar[4]
 

union { ... } BigEndian32Bit::m_val
 

Data union member which defines several access methods to the big endian number Byte member access (m_a, m_b, m_c, m_d) gives access to byte components in ascending order (i.e. BigEndian32Bit(Native32Bit(0xaabbccdd)) will result in m_a = 0xaa, m_b = 0xbb, m_c = 0xcc, m_d = 0xdd)
